entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clarify documentation of Process.Start return value #109435
  • The Unix implementation of Process type is not thread safe #109434
  • [API Proposal]: Add API to gracefully terminate process #109432
  • Trim analyzer produces unexpected IL2059 for nullable enum #109429
    10.0.0
  • [cdac] Finish unimplemented parts of GetMethodDescData #109426
    10.0.0
  • [cdac] document TypeValidation and MethodValidation #109425
    10.0.0
  • SIGBUS on macOS 15.1 #109423
  • Update usage of EOL Raspbian 10 Helix container image #109420
  • [Bug] COM component using netstandard2.0 library with correct binding redirects cannot find dependency #109417
  • Issue with 'AfterTargets="Publish"' and PublishAot #109414
  • JIT: Cloned loop not fully strength reduced on arm64 #109412
    10.0.0
  • [mono] android crash in `mono_object_handle_isinst` #109410
  • Ordered evaluation in FileSystemGlobbing Matcher #109408
  • Make SocksException(SR.net_socks_connection_failed) more informative #109404
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 10/28/2024 12:13:44 AM #109421
    10.0.0
  • The same code pinvoke will not generate. dmp in. net8, but it will generate. dmp in. net4.7.2 #109402
  • DispatchProxy generates a proxy type implementing the interface from the wrong ALC #109398
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce Prefix for MeterOptions #109397
  • .NET 10 Telemetry Work Tracking #109396
    10.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Delegate GDV check is not being hoisted outside the loop #109379
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect message for IL2026 for trim-sunsafe types in XAML type info metadata table #109272
    10.0.0
  • AssemblyResolve invoked #109403
  • Type.IsSerializable and FieldInfo.IsNotSerialized are marked with Obsolete in .NET 8 #102809
    9.0.0
  • Replacement for the obsolete ObjectIDGenerator #98168
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen on arm64 with comparison involving division #109337
    10.0.0
  • Culture-Info for no-No appears to differ between MacOs and Linux runtime #109409
  • [API Proposal]: Extend `JsonPropertyName` attribute to record member declarations #109411
  • Avoid hardcoded TFM in illink #109335
  • Impossible to JsonSerialize.Serialize(IPAddress.None)? #109401
  • Support for host file system access for Blazor/WASM from NodeJS env #109355
  • WASM publish on Ubuntu 24.04 mishandles staticwebassets #109266
    9.0.1
  • Expression interpreter - Bug when passing Type.Missing to Invoke calls #15553

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix file name buffer size for PAL's CreateProcess #109436
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set the ReferenceAssembly metadata on the manually added ReferencePath items #109433
    blocking, area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix analyzer tracking of nullable enums #109430
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • arm64: load 64bit constants from data section instead of 4 movz/k instructions #109428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make SocksException more informative #109427
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add annotations and regression testing for members accessed by legacy schema generation. #109424
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop using LINQ in Tensors #109415
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Adding info to debug WindowsAlternateDataStreamOverwrite failure #109399
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • JIT: Fix delegate GDV for loops with multiple cloning options #109407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable more red tests for crossgen lanes #109317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove the rest of the SimdAsHWIntrinsic support #106594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update ConstructorParamIncompleteBinding Exception Message #109393
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add myself to area-Infrastructure-mono in resourceManagement.yml #109419
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Use sync unwind tables on all arm64 targets #109406
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Don't assume unsigned division always produces non-negative result in value numbering #109384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Sort summary by collection name #109370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consume native deps install script from arcade #109371
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Avoid a LINQ usage in tensor extensions #109405
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Generate build metadata for illink #109376
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [LoongArch64] Fix build error for LA64. #109400
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add a note about our guaranteed string.Create behavior #109380
    needs-area-label
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add ref/out keywords on arguments for shadow methods in GeneratedComInterface #109382
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocking, source-generator

Updated

  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: account for newly unreachable blocks in morph #109394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type #109392
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, Future
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Moved inlinearray_value to infrequent_data structure in MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] GetMethodDescData for jitted methods #109187
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move GenTreeVecCon and GenTreeMskCon under the respective FEATURE_* defines #104932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Track GC info accurately into epilogs in codegen #107283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9/0] Automate dl 9 0 #109291
    area-Workloads, 9.0.1
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate redundant SafePasswordHandle values #109391
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Improve handling of encoding of X.520 attributes #109349
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Mitigate first-class Span breaks #108789
    area-codeflow
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add TryAdd and TryGetValue overloads with `out int index` to OrderedDictionary #109324
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Handle IOV_MAX limit in RandomAccess #109340
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
